name: Noob Knight
description:
Can you beat the spaghetti boss?

Don't worry if you lose tho, you can always become better and come to try again!

Press A , D you walk left and right respectively

Spacebar to Jump

X / Left-Mouse to Hit

Escape to Exit the game (No Main-Menu lol)

Note: The 2 Updates just fixed the array of sticks at the top, just a decoration

V002 was released before the jam ended by 2 or 1 min

V003 was released after the jam ended but it's just the same fix but for a different room

Other than that there were no differences, I removed V001 which was released before the jam ended by 5 or 6 hours but it was the same.
